name: Burning Blood
description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

name: Ring of the Snake
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Cracked Core
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.

name: Pure Water
description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle to your hand.

name: Akabeko
description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

name: Anchor
description: Start each combat with 10 Block.

name: Ancient Tea Set
description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 extra Energy.

name: Art of War
description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

name: Bag of Marbles
description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

name: Bag of Preparation
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Blood Vial
description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

name: Bronze Scales
description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back to the attacker.

name: Centennial Puzzle
description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

name: Ceramic Fish
description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.

name: Dream Catcher
description: Whenever you Rest at a Rest Site, you may add a card to your deck.

name: Happy Flower
description: Every 3 turns, gain 1 Energy.

name: Juzu Bracelet
description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

name: Lantern
description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

name: Maw Bank
description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works once you spend Gold at a Shop.

name: Meal Ticket
description: Whenever you enter a Shop, heal 15 HP.

name: Nunchaku
description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.

name: Oddly Smooth Stone
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Omamori
description: Negate the next 2 Curses you would obtain.

name: Orichalcum
description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

name: Pen Nib
description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

name: Potion Belt
description: Gain 2 additional Potion slots.

name: Preserved Insect
description: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.

name: Regal Pillow
description: Heal an additional 15 HP when Resting.

name: Smiling Mask
description: Card removal at the Shop always costs 50 Gold.

name: Strawberry
description: Gain 7 Max HP.

name: The Boot
description: Whenever you would deal less than 5 Attack damage, increase it to 5.

name: Tiny Chest
description: Every 4th ? room, gain a relic.

name: Toy Ornithopter
description: Whenever you use a Potion, heal 5 HP.

name: Vajra
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

name: War Paint
description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Skills in your deck.

name: Whetstone
description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attacks in your deck.

name: Red Skull
description: While at or below 50% HP, gain 3 Strength.

name: Snecko Skull
description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply 1 additional Poison.

name: Data Disk
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Focus.

name: Nuclear Battery
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.

name: Symbiotic Virus
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.

name: Runic Capacitor
description: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.

name: Damaru
description: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Mantra.

name: Cloak Clasp
description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.

name: Teardrop Locket
description: Start each combat in Calm.

name: Ninja Scroll
description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs to your hand.

name: Wrist Blade
description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.

name: Blue Candle
description: Curse cards can now be played; doing so Exhausts them and costs 1 HP.

name: Bottled Flame
description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. It starts in your hand each combat.

name: Bottled Lightning
description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. It starts in your hand each combat.

name: Bottled Tornado
description: Upon pickup, choose a Power. It starts in your hand each combat.

name: Darkstone Periapt
description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, gain 6 Max HP.

name: Eternal Feather
description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP at Rest Sites.

name: Frozen Egg
description: Whenever you add a Power to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Horn Cleat
description: At the start of your 2nd turn each combat, gain 14 Block.

name: Ink Bottle
description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.

name: Kunai
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Letter Opener
description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Matryoshka
description: The next 2 non-Boss chests contain 2 relics.

name: Meat on the Bone
description: If at or below 50% HP at end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Mercury Hourglass
description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Molten Egg
description: Whenever you add an Attack to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Mummified Hand
description: Whenever you play a Power, a random card in your hand costs 0 this turn.

name: Ornamental Fan
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

name: Pantograph
description: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.

name: Paper Crane
description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage instead of 25%.

name: Paper Frog
description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage instead of 50%.

name: Pear
description: Gain 10 Max HP.

name: Question Card
description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.

name: Shuriken
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

name: Singing Bowl
description: When adding cards, you may gain +2 Max HP instead.

name: Sundial
description: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain 2 Energy.

name: The Courier
description: The Shop always has card removal. 20% discount on all items.

name: Toxic Egg
description: Whenever you add a Skill to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: White Beast Statue
description: Potions always drop after combat.

name: Self-Forming Clay
description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.

name: Champion Belt
description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

name: Magic Flower
description: Healing is 50% more effective.

name: Tough Bandages
description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

name: Tingsha
description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

name: Twisted Funnel
description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

name: Inserter
description: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.

name: Duality
description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.

name: Violet Lotus
description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain 1 additional Energy.

name: Bird-Faced Urn
description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.

name: Calipers
description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block instead of all Block.

name: Captain's Wheel
description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

name: Dead Branch
description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

name: Du-Vu Doll
description: For each Curse in your deck, start combat with 1 additional Strength.

name: Fossilized Helix
description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.

name: Gambling Chip
description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

name: Ginger
description: You can no longer become Weakened.

name: Girya
description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).

name: Ice Cream
description: Energy is conserved between turns.

name: Incense Burner
description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.

name: Lizard Tail
description: When you would die, heal to 50% Max HP instead. Works once.

name: Mango
description: Gain 14 Max HP.

name: Old Coin
description: Gain 300 Gold.

name: Peace Pipe
description: You can now remove cards at Rest Sites.

name: Pocketwatch
description: If you play 3 or fewer cards in a turn, draw 3 additional cards next turn.

name: Prayer Wheel
description: Normal combats have additional card rewards.

name: Shovel
description: You can now dig for relics at Rest Sites.

name: Stone Calendar
description: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Thread and Needle
description: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.

name: Torii
description: Whenever you receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.

name: Tungsten Rod
description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

name: Turnip
description: You can no longer become Frail.

name: Unceasing Top
description: Whenever your hand is empty, draw a card.

name: Charon's Ashes
description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

name: The Specimen
description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer its Poison to a random enemy.

name: Hovering Kite
description: The first time you discard each turn, gain 1 Energy.

name: Emotion Chip
description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger all Orb passives at start of turn.

name: Golden Eye
description: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.

name: Astrolabe
description: Upon pickup, Transform and Upgrade 3 cards.

name: Black Star
description: Elites drop 2 relics instead of 1.

name: Busted Crown
description: Gain 1 Energy. Card rewards have 2 fewer choices.

name: Calling Bell
description: Upon pickup, obtain a Curse and 3 relics.

name: Coffee Dripper
description: Gain 1 Energy. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.

name: Cursed Key
description: Gain 1 Energy. Opening non-Boss chests gives a Curse.

name: Ectoplasm
description: Gain 1 Energy. You can no longer gain Gold.

name: Empty Cage
description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

name: Fusion Hammer
description: Gain 1 Energy. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

name: Mark of Pain
description: Gain 1 Energy. Start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.

name: Pandora's Box
description: Transform all Strikes and Defends.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: Gain 1 Energy. ALL enemies start with 1 Strength.

name: Runic Cube
description: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

name: Runic Dome
description: Gain 1 Energy. You can no longer see enemy Intents.

name: Runic Pyramid
description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

name: Sacred Bark
description: Double the effectiveness of potions.

name: Slaver's Collar
description: Gain 1 Energy during Elite and Boss combats.

name: Snecko Eye
description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. All card costs are randomized (0-3).

name: Sozu
description: Gain 1 Energy. You can no longer obtain Potions.

name: Tiny House
description: Gain 1 Potion, 50 Gold, 5 Max HP, 1 card, and Upgrade 1 random card.

name: Velvet Choker
description: Gain 1 Energy. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

name: Black Blood
description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Ring of the Serpent
description: Replaces Ring of the Snake. Draw 1 additional card each turn.

name: Frozen Core
description: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end turn with empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Lightning.

name: Holy Water
description: Replaces Pure Water. At start of combat, add 3 Miracles to your hand.

name: Clockwork Souvenir
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact.

name: Dolly's Mirror
description: Upon pickup, obtain a copy of a card in your deck.

name: Frozen Eye
description: When viewing your draw pile, cards are shown in order.

name: Hand Drill
description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

name: Lee's Waffle
description: Gain 7 Max HP. Heal to full HP.

name: Medical Kit
description: Status cards can now be played; doing so Exhausts them.

name: Membership Card
description: 50% discount at the Shop.

name: Orange Pellets
description: Play a Power, Skill, and Attack in the same turn to remove ALL debuffs.

name: Orrery
description: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

name: Prismatic Shard
description: Card rewards can now contain cards from any color.

name: Sling of Courage
description: At the start of Elite combats, gain 2 Strength.

name: Strange Spoon
description: Cards that Exhaust only Exhaust 50% of the time.

name: The Abacus
description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.

name: Brimstone
description: At start of turn, gain 2 Strength. ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.

name: Bloody Idol
description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.

name: Face of Cleric
description: Gain 1 Max HP after each combat.

name: Golden Idol
description: Gain 25% more Gold.

name: Gremlin Horn
description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

name: Mark of the Bloom
description: You can no longer heal.

name: Mutagenic Strength
description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. Lose 3 Strength at end of turn 1.

name: Necronomicon
description: The first Attack you play each turn that costs 2+ Energy is played twice.

name: Neow's Lament
description: The first 3 enemies you encounter have 1 HP.

name: N'loth's Hungry Face
description: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty.

name: Odd Mushroom
description: Vulnerable only increases damage taken by 25% instead of 50%.

name: Red Mask
description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

name: Ssserpent Head
description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.

name: Warped Tongs
description: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for combat.

name: Enchiridion
description: At the start of each combat, add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0.
